Home.description: A software engineer that enjoys coding with a cup of ☕ and share his passion with people around.
Home.welcome: Welcome to my personal website where you'll learn more about who I am, what I do and how to contact me!

work.name: Intern in full stack development
work.description:
In the context of the software engineering module, we worked with the MACC group to develop a royalty management module.

I was responsible for:
bullets: Elaborating a specifications document, user stories, and acceptance tests.
Implementing new modules using React.ts in the front-end and Spring Boot in the back-end.

work.name: Full stack JavaScript Instructor
work.description: I was responsible for teaching and guiding students from various backgrounds (not necessarily computer science) to learn:
bullets: Basic principles of networks (protocols, IP, OSI model, ..., etc).
SQL databases (MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Firebase).
Basics of security (encryption, hashing, trust triangle, ..., etc).

work.name: Front end Engineer
work.description:
Educe It is a multi-service communication company.

My responsibilities included:
bullets: Meeting potential clients and creating the specifications for new or existing websites.
Developing a solution in the form of an intuitive, fast, and responsive website using the latest technologies (React/Next, Node.js, Laravel).
Ensuring the maintenance of the solutions (including testing) and preparing documentation/user manuals.

edu.name: Master's in Software and Big Data
edu.description:
Currently enrolled in my final year for my second masters degree at the University of Poitiers in France.
Current valedictorian for the 1st year.

Key things I'm learning:

edu.name: Master's in Software Engineering and Information Processing
edu.description:
Master thesis: : IoT, design, and implementation of an autonomous car using reinforcement learning.
Achieved with a grade of 16.5/20.

Implemented with:
bullets: Gym environment + Unity / ML Agents (for Simulation)

edu.name: Bachelor's degree in Computer Systems.
edu.description:
Final year project: IoT, design, and implementation of a smart nanny.
Achieved with a grade of 17.5/20 and congratulations from the jury.
